data.lyric:
[ti:Rockin Around the Christmas Tree]
[ar:Justin Bieber]
[al:]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Rockin Around the Christmas Tree - Justin Bieber (贾斯汀·比伯)
[00:16.11]Rockin' around the Christmas tree
[00:18.91]At the Christmas party hop
[00:22.32]Mistletoe hung where you can see
[00:25.16]Every couple tries to stop
[00:28.64]Rockin' around the Christmas tree
[00:31.46]Let the Christmas spirit ring
[00:34.97]Later we'll have some pumpkin pie
[00:37.80]And we'll do some caroling
[00:41.42]You will get a sentimental feeling when you hear
[00:47.66]Voices singing "Let's be jolly
[00:50.88]Deck the halls with boughs of holly"
[00:53.98]Rockin' around the Christmas tree
[00:56.57]Have a happy holiday
[01:00.27]Everyone dancing merrily
[01:03.01]In the new old fashioned way
[01:19.54]You will get a sentimental feeling when you hear
[01:25.60]Voices singing "Let's be jolly
[01:28.77]Deck thе halls with boughs of holly"
[01:31.92]Rockin' around the Christmas tree
[01:34.64]Let the Christmas spirit ring
[01:38.15]Later we'll have some pumpkin pie
[01:40.93]And we'll do some caroling
[01:44.62]Rockin' around the Christmas tree
[01:47.12]Have a happy holiday
[01:50.78]Everyone dancing merrily
[01:53.57]In the new old fashioned way way
data.trans:
[ti:Rockin Around the Christmas Tree]
[ar:Justin Bieber]
[al:]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:16.11]在圣诞树旁摇摆起舞
[00:18.91]在圣诞派对上热舞狂欢
[00:22.32]目之所及 挂满槲寄生
[00:25.16]每对爱侣都会驻足
[00:28.64]在圣诞树旁摇摆起舞
[00:31.46]洋溢在圣诞氛围中
[00:34.97]稍后我们会尝试一些南瓜派
[00:37.80]我们会唱一些圣诞颂歌
[00:41.42]当你听到那些颂歌 你会情绪高涨
[00:47.66]大声歌唱让我们快乐
[00:50.88]冬青枝挂满大堂
[00:53.98]在圣诞树旁摇摆起舞
[00:56.57]愿你有一个快乐的假期
[01:00.27]每个人愉快地起舞
[01:03.01]跳着传统的舞蹈
[01:19.54]当你听到那些颂歌 你会情绪高涨
[01:25.60]大声歌唱让我们快乐
[01:28.77]冬青枝挂满大堂
[01:31.92]在圣诞树旁摇摆起舞
[01:34.64]洋溢在圣诞氛围中
[01:38.15]稍后我们会尝试一些南瓜派
[01:40.93]我们会唱一些圣诞颂歌
[01:44.62]在圣诞树旁摇摆起舞
[01:47.12]愿你有一个快乐的假期
[01:50.78]每个人愉快地起舞
[01:53.57]跳着传统的舞蹈
